billEvents.eventText: referred to consumer affairs and protection

title: Relates to the reuse of wireless telephone numbers
summary: Relates to the reuse of wireless telephone numbers; requires wireless telephone service providers to inform customers of how recently a cell phone number has been used and if it was within the last year, such customer shall have the right to request a different number.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the reuse of wireless telephone numbers
